pkgmetadata.longdescription: Animal Movement Tools // Manage and analyze animal movement data. The functionality of 'amt' includes methods to calculate track statistics (e.g. step lengths, speed, or turning angles), prepare data for fitting habitat selection analyses (resource selection functions and step-selection functions doi:10.1890/04-0953 and integrated step-selection functions doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12528), and simulation of space-use from fitted step-selection functions doi:10.1002/ecs2.1771.
